page.title: 15Crowthorne Recreation:Sport
page.content:
{ Edgbarrow Sports Centre}provides facilities for a number of activities. The following figures represent the bookings for the last nine months.
{Squash} 11200 {Aerobics, Keep Fit} 9000 {Badminton} 7600 {5-a- side Football} 2080 {Cricket} 1700 {Junior Sports} 1300 {Tennis} 1200 {Hockey } 800 {Table Tennis} 70
The Centre also hosts{evening adult {education courses . }8700 people have attended these this year. {Trampolining, gymnastics and wayfaring are also popular. During the school holidays special courses in a variety of sports are arranged for children.
